name: Mental Barrier Fortification
description: Training to build an impenetrable mental fortress against psychic and psychological intrusions.

cards.title: Building an Unbreakable Mind
cards.description: Developing a disciplined mind that cannot be manipulated or hijacked.
bulletpoints: Techniques for reinforcing mental boundaries against manipulation.
Developing thought autonomy and independent critical reasoning.
Understanding how belief structures are used for control and how to dismantle them.

cards.title: Psychic Shielding Against Intrusions
cards.description: Defending against external psionic attacks and energetic manipulations.
bulletpoints: How to recognize and resist external thought imposition.
Using visualization and intent-based techniques to block psychic infiltration.
Understanding the role of frequency control in mental defense.

cards.title: Neutralizing Mind-Control Programs
cards.description: Deconstructing and reversing psychic and psychological programming.
bulletpoints: Recognizing hypnotic triggers and programming scripts.
Techniques for self-deprogramming from implanted beliefs.
Using counter-conditioning methods to dismantle embedded suggestions.
